question: A markup language is a dynamic programming language that uses logic
HTML users predefined tagged and elements which tell the browser how to properlydisplay contents
The <body> tag consists of all visible contents of a webpage
The color property of CSS is used to change the background image of an element
CSS allows you to apply styleto multiple elements at once using class selector
what is the primary purpose of markup language
options: To structure, organize and present data or content
answer: To structure, organize and present data or content

question: Which one is true about HTML tags
options: HTML tags are not case sensitive
answer: HTML tags are not case sensitive

question: What is the function of <title> tag in HTML
options: Add a footer to a page
Display a pages title in browser's tab
answer: Display a pages title in browser's tab
